output.sentences: Have you ever thought about your first Fourth of July?
There were so many new treats to taste-test.
And often, you were confused as to why everyone was gathered around that hot smoking box.
Or why your parents were so excited when it got dark.
Or why everyone cheered when those loud booms rocked the night.
